title: 9/1 - Top Floor! Spacious + Modern 3 Bedroom in Kendall/East Cambridge
posting_body: Available for Sept 1st (Cleaned and Painted between tenants)
Spacious and Renovated 3 Bedroom/1 Bath on the 220-230 block of Charles St located on the 2nd floor of a professionally managed building in East Cambridge.
Walking Distance to Kendall Square/MIT Red Line and Lechmere Green Line T-Stops.
This location is Very Walkable so most errands can be accomplished on foot, it has a Walk Score of 89 out of 100.

This apartment features hardwood flooring, a huge renovated eat-in kitchen with full-size stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher and built-in microwave, a large, renovated bathroom, a spacious and sunny living room facing Charles St, and three medium sized bedrooms with closets.
There is laundry in the basement which is mobile pay.
- Pet-Friendly (Dogs allowed w/ Property Manager's Approval)
- Car sharing is available from Zipcar, RelayRides, and Hertz On Demand.
- The rent includes water and sewer, and tenants responsible for the remaining utilities such as cooking gas, heat, and electricity.
- Mobile Pay laundry in the basement
- 5-minute walk to the 69 Bus Stop at Cambridge St
- 10-11 minutes walking distance to Green Line @ Lechmere Station
- 10-11 minutes walking distance to the 80, 87, 88 Bus Stop at Lechmere Station
